title: Which of the following is a real-time operating system?
What is the main function of an operating system?
answer2: To manage hardware and software resources
rightAnswer: To manage hardware and software resources

title: Which of the following is NOT an operating system?
What is the purpose of the kernel in an operating system?
answer2: To manage system resources and communication between hardware and software
rightAnswer: To manage system resources and communication between hardware and software

title: Which of the following is used for memory management in an operating system?
What is a deadlock in an operating system?
answer2: A situation where processes are waiting indefinitely for resources
rightAnswer: A situation where processes are waiting indefinitely for resources
